activities: Digital Mountain, Inc. is an electronic discovery, computer forensics and cyber security company.  Personal information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland will come from organizations or individuals who wish for Digital Mountain, Inc. to perform electronic discovery, computer forensics or cyber security services upon storage media (e.g. hard drives, CDs/DVDs, memory drives, etc.) which could include personally identifiable information from individuals from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.  Such data will only be manually modified or transferred as it pertains to the engagement agreement between Digital Mountain, Inc. and its clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: offline and/or online manually processed data
